name: Sapoconcho
description:
CONTENT WARNING: CONTAINS CHEAP JUMPSCARES, LOTS OF TREES AND TORTOISES ON WHEELS. YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED.

SAPOCONCHO

Your life takes a spooky turn when your pet tortoise Sapoconcho consumes a funny-looking meteorite you found in the woods around your house, which transforms it into an ugly mutant monster with an endless thirst to jumpscare people... and you're the only one who can stop it! ...or at least escape from it.

SNEAK INTO THE FOREST

Use small hills and tall grass to hide from Sapoconcho while you try to escape, all while avoiding evil spooky enemies like branches on the ground.

Note: doesn't include cardboard boxes.

UNCOVER THE MYSTERY OF THE WOODS

Something strange is going on in the forest, and as a video game protagonist, it's your job to discover the secret behind it!

EXPLORE A VAST FOREST

...mostly consisting on trees.

ESCAPE YOUR PET And face the spookiest part of the game... the ending.
GET SPOOKED

This is an extremely spooky game!

"0/10. You can't play as Luigi" ~GamePot "8/10. It really makes you feel like you're escaping from an ugly tortoise in the woods. It has a little something for everyone!" ~ING "5/10. Doesn't include a "very easy" mode, and the incredibly spooky jumpscares make it too difficult to get through" ~Tomaku

Developed by Truman Cian and Agaba
